_source.short_desc: On-prem & cloud-based unified endpoint management and security tool that helps manage organization endpoints from single console.
_source.long_desc: Endpoint Central is a unified endpoint management solution that helps in managing servers, laptops, desktops, smartphones, & tablets from a central location. Using either an on-premise or a cloud-based UEM allows you to automate regular endpoint management routines like installing patches, deploying software, imaging & deploying OS, manage mobiles & BYOD devices, remote troubleshooting, modern management & much more! It also has a mobile app that allows you to manage endpoints anywhere, anytime!
_source.pricing_details:
Desktop Central Professional Edition: $645.00/year

Suitable for managing 50 desktop computers in LAN

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based suite of cybersecurity solutions that help businesses identify, analyze and remediate threats on a unified platform.
related_products.features: Cloud-based Endpoint Protection rated #1 for ease-of-use to help businesses identify, analyze, and remediate threats on a unified platform.

related_products.short_desc: 1Password's industry-leading security brings private, secure, and user-friendly secrets management to more than 115,000 businesses.
related_products.features:
1Password combines industry-leading security with award-winning design to bring private, secure, and user-friendly secrets management to more than 115,000 businesses. 
Store anything from logins and secure notes to SSH keys and sensitive documents. Get your secrets out of spreadsheets and emails and into 1Password for secure sharing and a single source of truth. You can even monitor and mitigate security risks like potential breaches, password health, and team usage from your insights dashboard.

related_products.short_desc: Cybersecurity application for IT administrators to prevent data breaches, covering a suite of devices, networks, and applications.
related_products.features: ESET Endpoint Security software is a cloud-based and on-premises application for internet security and malware protection. It has a global user base that comprises businesses of every size. Cloud sandbox technology enables users to protect their mobile devices, laptops, and desktops against ransomware, zero-day attacks, and data breaches. It features file, bot, and mail protection, along with remote device management, virtualization security, firewall set-up, and web control.

related_products.short_desc: Simplified endpoint management for desktops, servers, and mobile laptops.
related_products.features: GoTo Central is a powerful, easy-to-use endpoint management solution enabling IT professionals to effectively monitor, manage, and secure their endpoint infrastructure. Whether you have remote employees or endpoints scattered across the globe, GoTo Central provides IT organizations with the speed, flexibility, and insight needed to increase productivity, reduce IT costs, and mitigate risk.

related_products.short_desc: DNS web content & security filter for business that blocks malware, ransomware and phishing + provides advanced web content control.
related_products.features: DNS Based Web content filter that blocks malware, ransomware and phishing attempts as well as providing web content control. We filter over 1/2 a billion DNS requests every day, identify 60,000 malware iterations a day and have over 7,500 customers. Cloud and gateway versions available. Try a free Trial of WebTitan today, support included.

related_products.short_desc: Endpoint data loss protection and security platform that enables small businesses to manage recovery of deleted files and more.
related_products.features: Endpoint data loss protection and security platform that enables small businesses and organizations to recover lost data caused through human error, ransomware or any other online disaster, where the recovered files can be tracked through status reports.

related_products.short_desc: Multi-vector protection against viruses and malware offering full protection against all of today's sophisticated malware threats.
related_products.features: Multi-vector protection against viruses and malware offering full protection against all of today's sophisticated malware threats including Trojans, keyloggers, phishing, spyware, back-doors, rootkits, zero-day and advanced persistent threats. Built in Identity & Privacy Shield stops data being stolen or captured when using the Internet and the outbound firewall also stops malware stealing data. No need to worry about or run updates, cloud-driven security means endpoints are always up to date.

related_products.short_desc: The JumpCloud Directory Platform reimagines the directory as a complete platform for identity, access, and device management.
related_products.features: JumpCloud is an open directory platform for secure, frictionless access from any device to any resource, anywhere. JumpClouds mission is to Make Work Happen, providing simple, secure access to corporate technology resources from any device, or any location. The JumpCloud Directory Platform gives IT, MSPs, VARs/Distributors, security operations, and DevOps a single, cloud-based solution to control and manage employee identities, their devices, and apply Zero Trust principles.

related_products.short_desc: CleanMyMac X is an all-in-one optimization kit for Mac. It deletes 49 types of Mac junk, optimizing the performance on every step.
related_products.features:
CleanMyMac X is a complete set of Mac cleanup and productivity tools. 

If your team uses Macs, CleanMyMac X is the right app to boost their performance. It fixes the most common Mac issues: cleanup, speedup, protection, and helps organize apps and files for increased productivity.

- Free up gigabytes of space
- Tune a Mac to its maximum speed
- Neutralize Mac-specific viruses and adware
- Update all software in one click
- Find and delete non-productive apps

related_products.short_desc: Ninja Protect provides unprecedented visibility & control over endpoints, robust patching, and backup capabilities.
related_products.features: Ninja Protect is NinjaOne's single-pane solution for endpoint protection. Providing unprecedented visibility & control over endpoints, robust patching, endpoint hardening, backup, and data protection capabilities alongside Bitdefender's industry-leading next-generation AV & EDR capabilities, Ninja Protect is a holistic solution for endpoint protection. By combining these two powerful solutions, Ninja Protect helps IT leaders reduce their attack surface, stop active ransomware threats, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: SecureDoc Disk Encryption offers businesses Enterprise manageable, full-scale encryption using a sector-by-sector encryption approach.
similar_products.features: Our product ensures the protection of sensitive information stored on desktops, laptops, tablets & servers by employing single or multi-factor authentication from password to hardware token, and Smart card support for PreBoot Authentication (PBA). SecureDoc with PBConnex allows for preboot network authentication either wired or wirelessly by utilizing network based resources to authenticate users, enforce access controls, and manage end point devices before the operating system loads.

similar_products.short_desc: N-able EDR provides next-generation antivirus with behavioral AI threat detection and one-click remediation and rollback capabilities.
similar_products.features: N-able Endpoint Detection and Response (EDR) helps MSPs prevent, detect, and respond to ever-changing cyberthreats. Powered by SentinelOne, N-able EDR provides next-generation antivirus with behavioral AI threat detection and one-click remediation and rollback capabilities. As an integrated feature of N-able N-central and N-able RMM, N-able EDR lets you gain full monitoring and management of your endpoint security, all from a single dashboard.

similar_products.short_desc: N-able N-central? is a powerful tool with advanced protection beyond antivirus alone to provide a full layered security solution.
similar_products.features: N-able N-central? gives you comprehensive security features with maximum flexibility. A powerful tool that provides risk intelligence, web content filtering, two-way firewalls, and fast backup and recovery, N-central offers a strong layered approach to your customers' IT security. It can also help protect them against today's cyberthreats.

similar_products.short_desc: Ninja Protect provides unprecedented visibility & control over endpoints, robust patching, and backup capabilities.
similar_products.features: Ninja Protect is NinjaOne's single-pane solution for endpoint protection. Providing unprecedented visibility & control over endpoints, robust patching, endpoint hardening, backup, and data protection capabilities alongside Bitdefender's industry-leading next-generation AV & EDR capabilities, Ninja Protect is a holistic solution for endpoint protection. By combining these two powerful solutions, Ninja Protect helps IT leaders reduce their attack surface, stop active ransomware threats, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: A revolutionary, 100% signature-free component that provides market-leading detection and remediation of ransomware attacks.
similar_products.features: Heimdal Ransomware Encryption Protection is an innovative and signature-free cybersecurity module with market-leading detection and remediation capacities that prevent any type of ransomware. This includes both fileless and file-based strains for complete, round-the-clock safety. It can detect any encryption attempt, even those that have no signatures or behavioral patterns. Our solution was built to be universally compatible with any antivirus, be it Heimdal's own NGAV or something else.

similar_products.short_desc: Portnox offers cloud-native network & endpoint security essentials that enable IT teams to address today's pressing security challenges
similar_products.features:
Great for all industries with 500-10,000 Employees.
Portnox CLEAR is the only cloud-native network access control (NAC) solution that unifies essential network and endpoint security capabilities: device discovery, network authentication, access control, network hardware administration, risk mitigation and compliance enforcement. As a cloud service, Portnox CLEAR is vendor agnostic and eliminates the need for on-going maintenance such as upgrades and patches and requires no on-site appliances.

similar_products.short_desc: Multi-vector protection against viruses and malware offering full protection against all of today's sophisticated malware threats.
similar_products.features: Multi-vector protection against viruses and malware offering full protection against all of today's sophisticated malware threats including Trojans, keyloggers, phishing, spyware, back-doors, rootkits, zero-day and advanced persistent threats. Built in Identity & Privacy Shield stops data being stolen or captured when using the Internet and the outbound firewall also stops malware stealing data. No need to worry about or run updates, cloud-driven security means endpoints are always up to date.

similar_products.short_desc: Banyan's ZTNA solution provides secure one-click access to applications and infrastructure from anywhere - without legacy VPNs.
similar_products.features: Banyan Security's Zero Trust Newtork Access (ZTNA) solution enables fast, easy provisioning of user-to-application segmentation, giving users passwordless, one-click access to corporate applications, resources, and infrastructure from anywhere - without needing network-centric legacy VPNs. Risk and security are continuously evaluated and enforced in real-time across hybrid, multi-cloud, and SaaS environments.

similar_products.short_desc: Cybersecurity application for IT administrators to prevent data breaches, covering a suite of devices, networks, and applications.
similar_products.features: ESET Endpoint Security software is a cloud-based and on-premises application for internet security and malware protection. It has a global user base that comprises businesses of every size. Cloud sandbox technology enables users to protect their mobile devices, laptops, and desktops against ransomware, zero-day attacks, and data breaches. It features file, bot, and mail protection, along with remote device management, virtualization security, firewall set-up, and web control.

similar_products.short_desc: Device control software. Block USB removable storage devices and other peripherals to secure sensitive data against theft and misuse.
similar_products.features:
AccessPatrol is a device control software that provides a proactive solution for securing company endpoints against data breaches caused by illicit data transfers.

AccessPatrol includes device control features for a variety of peripheral devices including USBs, CD/DVDs, BlueTooth, WiFi, FireWire, iPods, and MP3s.

File operations alerts and permissions can be configured to alert IT administrators to suspicious file operations and proactively prevent data transfers to unauthorized users.

similar_products.short_desc: Cybersecurity with AI-powered prevention, detection, response and hunting in a single autonomous XDR platform.
similar_products.features: At SentinelOne, we are redefining cybersecurity by pushing the boundaries of autonomous technology. Our Singularity? XDR Platform encompasses AI-powered prevention, detection, response, and threat hunting across user endpoints, containers, cloud workloads, and IoT devices. Empowering modern enterprises to defend faster, at greater scale, and with higher accuracy across their entire attack surface.

similar_products.short_desc: Eliminate local admin rights across all Windows endpoints and curb ransomware attacks and malware propagation at the earliest.
similar_products.features: Securden Windows Privilege manager is an all-in-one endpoint protection system that helps implement the principle of least privilege by removing administrative rights from all Windows endpoints using a lightweight agent. This agent further helps in controlling and tracking application usage and helps in protecting endpoints against ransomware attacks and preventing malware propagation. Securden WPM helps with any compliance regulation that mandates enforcement of the least privilege.

similar_products.short_desc: The ultimate next-generation antivirus powered by market-leading threat intelligence, forensics, and firewall integration.
similar_products.features: Heimdal Next-Gen Endpoint Antivirus is an NGAV solution designed to provide market-leading endpoint detection and response through local signature-based file scanning, sandbox and backdoor analysis, process and behavior-based examination, and real-time cloud inspection. It is the detection-oriented counterpart to our threat prevention offering, Heimdal Threat Prevention. Besides its EDR features, Heimdal NGAV comes with complete firewall integration, which will further secure your workstations.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Computer Security software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Computer Security tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Computer Security software automates the security and monitoring of computer systems from malware, threats and unauthorized use. These applications scan and monitor an organization's computer network to evaluate potential vulnerabilities. Additionally, Computer Security solutions provide customizable network security solutions as well as those preconfigured for a variety of regulatory standards. Computer Security software provides for real-time reporting on network security as well as incident reports for potential security breaches. Computer Security software is related to Network Security software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Endpoint Detection and Response software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Endpoint Detection and Response tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Endpoint Detection And Response (EDR) software helps organizations protect their networks from malicious software that can enter the system via endpoint devices.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Identity Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Identity Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Identity Management software provides organizations with the tools for managing employee access to a variety of corporate resources, physical as well as virtual. This software commonly offers single sign-on facilitation as a feature. Identity Management software enables policy-based access governance with an option to selectively revoke access from any given employee. For related software solutions see Compliance software, Risk Management software, and Employee Monitoring software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Mobile Device Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Mobile Device Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Mobile Device Management software is used to remotely configure as well as distribute data and applications to mobile devices such as phones and PDAs. This type of software allows organizations to sync mobile devices and provide greater efficiency for the mobile workforce. Mobile Device Management software is related to Mobile software, IT Management software, and IT Asset Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Mobility software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Mobility tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Mobility software enables organizations to deploy, manage, and secure mobile apps, as well as to manage mobile devices. These products allow companies to manage the mobile app lifecycle so that workforces can easily retrieve enterprise data from the field. Mobility software is related to Application Development software and Mobile Device Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Network Security software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Network Security tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Network Security software prevents unauthorized access to a computer network. Organizations use these applications to prevent unauthorized, malicious or inadvertent intrusions into or usage of secure systems. Network Security solutions are designed to recognize legitimate traffic over today's complex enterprise networks and isolate abnormal events for further investigation as well as to perform key security audit and regulatory compliance functions. Features can include anti-spam, anti-virus, and intrusion detection. Network Security software is related to Computer Security software and Network Monitoring software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Password Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Password Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Password Management software enables IT teams and users to secure system passwords within a digital vault. Most offer the ability to reset or unlock passwords, synchronize passwords across devices and systems, and generate random passwords for security. Related software categories include Computer Security software, Identity Management software, and Endpoint Management software.

category_features.name: Automatic User/Device Recognition
category_features.definition: Allows for the system to automatically recognize who is using a device and what the device is

category_features.name: Data Management
category_features.definition: Enables users to optimize, secure, and manage large sets of data.

category_features.name: Deployment Management
category_features.definition: Manage the processes involved when making the application ready for use

category_features.name: Endpoint Management
category_features.definition: Track status, assign actions, and control access to systems for devices within the organization

category_features.name: Inventory Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage the quantity of resources on hand to maintain proper supply

category_features.name: Software Management
category_features.definition: Allows businesses to manage the software installed on their devices.

category_features.name: Synchronization Scheduling
category_features.definition: Create a schedule when files and folders are synchronized

category_features.name: Wireless Internet Access
category_features.definition: Supports a connection through a wireless network

category_features.name: Asset Tracking
category_features.definition: Monitor assets (i.e. equipments, tools, software, hardware, etc.) lifecycle and usage from acquisition to retirement

category_features.name: Availability Management
category_features.definition: Monitor and analyze availability issues to help design and plan the improvement of service availability

category_features.name: Change Management
category_features.definition: Track and monitor efficient handling of all IT service changes/transitions

category_features.name: Configuration Management
category_features.definition: Identify and maintain components (i.e. servers, configuration information, software, etc.) and their relationships across all service

category_features.name: Contract/License Management
category_features.definition: Track, store, and maintain contracts/licenses that come with procured products or services to ensure they are adhered to

category_features.name: Incident Management
category_features.definition: Identify, resolve and restore unplanned service failures/disruptions or injuries

category_features.name: Problem Management
category_features.definition: Identify and solve underlying cause of incident(s), and prevent future incidents from occurring

category_features.name: Project Management
category_features.definition: Plan and coordinate all the resources, costs and time needed to execute assignments

category_features.name: Release Management
category_features.definition: Plan and coordinate the testing/deployment of IT service releases (i.e. service changes)

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

related_products.short_desc: The #1 rated mobile device management (MDM) solution. Easily order, set up, and manage your company's Apple and Windows devices.
related_products.features: The #1 rated mobile device management (MDM) solution. You can easily order, set up, and manage your company's Apple and Windows devices -- all in one, integrated platform.

related_products.short_desc: A complete Mobile Device Management solution for IT pros to simplify the deployment, inventory, and security of Apple devices.
related_products.features: Jamf Pro is a complete device management solution for IT pros to simplify the deployment, inventory and security of Macs, iPads, iPhones and Apple TVs. Designed to automate device management while driving end-user productivity, Jamf Pro is the EMM tool that delights IT pros and the users they support by delivering on the promise of unified endpoint management for Apple devices. The IT experience you want is within reach. Request a free trial and become an IT superhero today.

related_products.short_desc: DNS web content & security filter for business that blocks malware, ransomware and phishing + provides advanced web content control.
related_products.features:
WebTitan is a DNS Based Web content filter and Web security layer that blocks cyber attacks, malware, ransomware and malicious phishing as well as providing granular web content control.

WebTitan DNS filtering filters over 2 billion DNS requests every day and identifies 300,000 malware iterations a day.

Try a free Trial of WebTitan today, full support included.

related_products.short_desc: The JumpCloud Directory Platform reimagines the directory as a complete platform for identity, access, and device management.
related_products.features: JumpCloud is an open directory platform for secure, frictionless access from any device to any resource, anywhere. JumpClouds mission is to Make Work Happen, providing simple, secure access to corporate technology resources from any device, or any location. The JumpCloud Directory Platform gives IT, MSPs, VARs/Distributors, security operations, and DevOps a single, cloud-based solution to control and manage employee identities, their devices, and apply Zero Trust principles.

related_products.short_desc: Miradore is a cloud-based MDM / UEM platform that provides a smarter way to securely manage Android, iOS, macOS, and Windows devices.
related_products.features:
Miradore Mobile Device Management (MDM) has various features that help you easily and cost-effectively ensure security and compliance on all your mobile devices. With Miradore you can enroll, secure, track and manage Android, iOS, macOS, and Windows devices from one place. 

Efficient mobile device management enables your employees to work without interruptions.

Getting started is simple and free - when needed, you can unlock additional features with our paid plan.

related_products.short_desc: Automate Mobile Device Management (MDM) allows you to manage your clients devices & protect their IT network & information. Start tour!
related_products.features: ConnectWise Automate, formerly LabTech, Mobile Device Management (MDM) allows you to fully manage your clients Apple iOS and Google Android platform devices to effectively protect their IT network and the confidential information stored on mobile devices. Whether your clients embrace a Bring Your Own Device (BYOD) model or provide mobile devices to their employees, they'll gain critical protection of their IT infrastructure. Start your guided tour today!

related_products.short_desc: Scalefusion MDM is a powerful and scalable platform that allows organizations to manage Android, iOS, macOS and Windows 10 devices.
related_products.features: Scalefusion (formerly MobiLock Pro) MDM allows organizations to secure and manage endpoints including smartphones, tablets, laptops, rugged devices, mPOS, and digital signages, along with apps and content. It supports the management of Android, iOS, macOS and Windows 10 devices and ensures streamlined device management operations with Scalefusion Workflows.

related_products.short_desc: An all in one solution for iOS, fireOS, Macs, Android, Apple TVs, Windows devices and laptop management.
related_products.features: Hexnode is an award-winning Unified Endpoint Management solution that offers overall device management and security solutions for both BYOD and corporate-owned devices. With a wide range of features such as application management, kiosk management, and containerization lined-up, Hexnode has got lots more in-store to satisfy its customer requirements. It supports iOS, Android, fireOS, Windows, Macs, and Apple TVs.

related_products.short_desc: TRUCE MDM allows you to easily provision and manage the mobile phones and tablets your team is using. Zero Costs, Zero Fees, Always.
related_products.features: TRUCE MDM is a Mobile Device Management platform for a Field-Based Workforce. Easily provision and manage the mobile phones and tablets your team is using. It?s managed mobility for work, however and wherever work is getting done. Manage any iOS or Android mobile phone or tablet. Easy, guided implementation for company-owned, BYOD or personal devices. There are no minimums or limits on devices and No set up fees or monthly charges. Download TRUCE MDM for Free, Today!

related_products.short_desc: Next-generation Apple device management for macOS, iOS, iPadOS, and tvOS.
related_products.features: We're Kandji: the Apple device management and security platform that empowers secure and productive global work. Through advanced automation and thoughtful experiences, we're bringing much-needed harmony to the way admins, end-users, and global teams work today and tomorrow.

similar_products.features: We're Kandji: the Apple device management and security platform that empowers secure and productive global work. Through advanced automation and thoughtful experiences, we're bringing much-needed harmony to the way admins, end-users, and global teams work today and tomorrow.

similar_products.short_desc: ManageEngine Mobile Device Manager Plus is an Enterprise Mobile Device Management software to manage your iOS, Android & Windows device
similar_products.features:
ManageEngine Mobile Device Manager Plus is an Enterprise Mobility Management (EMM) solution that gives enterprises the ability to harness the power of mobility.
 
Improve employee productivity without compromising on enterprise security with features like mobile device management, application management, email management and device containerization.
 
Available as both an on premise as well as a cloud offering, MDM has been developed keeping user demands and IT security requirements in mind.

similar_products.short_desc: Automate Mobile Device Management (MDM) allows you to manage your clients devices & protect their IT network & information. Start tour!
similar_products.features: ConnectWise Automate, formerly LabTech, Mobile Device Management (MDM) allows you to fully manage your clients Apple iOS and Google Android platform devices to effectively protect their IT network and the confidential information stored on mobile devices. Whether your clients embrace a Bring Your Own Device (BYOD) model or provide mobile devices to their employees, they'll gain critical protection of their IT infrastructure. Start your guided tour today!

similar_products.short_desc: Go beyond basic MDM with Esper's device infrastructure and automation tools, so you can focus on innovating and delighting customers.
similar_products.features: Going beyond the basics of traditional MDM, Esper provides stable, flexible device infrastructure and automation tools, so you can focus on innovation and creating exceptional customer experiences. Esper enables your digital modernization with a safe, reliable, repeatable solution for updating devices, monitoring current device state, and using advanced telemetry to track apps, OS, and hardware. Esper's robust device management tools allow you to sustainably solve challenges for the long term.

similar_products.short_desc: EasyControl is a turn-key mobile device management solution that can secure your mobile assets from anywhere.
similar_products.features: EasyControl leverages a vertically integrated market to bring highly customized MDM solutions from hardware manufacturers to the end user experience. We are the world's premier mobile device management and endpoint management cloud platform. EasyControl will support a variety of deployment scenarios, such as dedicated devices, COPE (enterprise owned, personal enabled) and BYOD (Bring Your Own Devices). It is suitable for various industries, such as fitness, tele-health, logistics, education, etc

similar_products.short_desc: Scalefusion MDM is a powerful and scalable platform that allows organizations to manage Android, iOS, macOS and Windows 10 devices.
similar_products.features: Scalefusion (formerly MobiLock Pro) MDM allows organizations to secure and manage endpoints including smartphones, tablets, laptops, rugged devices, mPOS, and digital signages, along with apps and content. It supports the management of Android, iOS, macOS and Windows 10 devices and ensures streamlined device management operations with Scalefusion Workflows.

similar_products.short_desc: The #1 rated mobile device management (MDM) solution. Easily order, set up, and manage your company's Apple and Windows devices.
similar_products.features: The #1 rated mobile device management (MDM) solution. You can easily order, set up, and manage your company's Apple and Windows devices -- all in one, integrated platform.

similar_products.short_desc: Addigy provides the leading cloud-based IT Management Platform specifically for managing your Apple ecosystem, including all Macs and i
similar_products.features:
Addigy is a cloud-based IT management platform that enables MSPs and IT teams to manage macOS, iOS, iPadOS and tvOS devices across multiple clients and locations. 

Addigy is the only multi-tenant Apple device management solution built for IT service providers and enterprise IT teams, providing an intuitive platform with zero-touch provisioning, asset management, monitoring and automated remediation, remote access, software deployment, configuration management, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: The JumpCloud Directory Platform reimagines the directory as a complete platform for identity, access, and device management.
similar_products.features: JumpCloud is an open directory platform for secure, frictionless access from any device to any resource, anywhere. JumpClouds mission is to Make Work Happen, providing simple, secure access to corporate technology resources from any device, or any location. The JumpCloud Directory Platform gives IT, MSPs, VARs/Distributors, security operations, and DevOps a single, cloud-based solution to control and manage employee identities, their devices, and apply Zero Trust principles.

similar_products.short_desc: Miradore is a cloud-based MDM / UEM platform that provides a smarter way to securely manage Android, iOS, macOS, and Windows devices.
similar_products.features:
Miradore Mobile Device Management (MDM) has various features that help you easily and cost-effectively ensure security and compliance on all your mobile devices. With Miradore you can enroll, secure, track and manage Android, iOS, macOS, and Windows devices from one place. 

Efficient mobile device management enables your employees to work without interruptions.

Getting started is simple and free - when needed, you can unlock additional features with our paid plan.

similar_products.short_desc: StixMDM is a modern SAAS based mobile device management solution.
similar_products.features:
StixMDM offers a reliable, secure and low cost MDM solution for businesses. Primarily focusing on Ease of Use for our customers and Security across multiple platforms. 
StixMDM platform is ideal for Hospitality, Retail, Field Services, Restaurants and Education.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Endpoint Detection and Response software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Endpoint Detection and Response tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Endpoint Detection And Response (EDR) software helps organizations protect their networks from malicious software that can enter the system via endpoint devices.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IT Asset Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IT Asset Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: IT Asset Management software provides enterprise wide inventory and life cycle management of software and hardware assets. This can include asset maintenance history, user permissions, acquisition budget forecasting, and software license compliance. This type of software enables IT managers to improve cost control and accurately track IT's business value throughout the organization. IT Asset Management software is related to Compliance software, License Management software, and IT Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IT Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IT Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: IT Management software provides the tools and process for controlling and monitoring computer networks, including: operating systems, applications, network devices, security measures, mainframes, access control systems, web services, and databases. Organizations use IT Management applications to manage activities across their systems, evaluating capacity, user activities, software inventory and installation, server availability, and virus or malware protection. IT Management software is related to Application Performance Management software, Business Continuity software, Database Management software, Server Management software, Network Monitoring software and Network Security software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Mobility software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Mobility tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Mobility software enables organizations to deploy, manage, and secure mobile apps, as well as to manage mobile devices. These products allow companies to manage the mobile app lifecycle so that workforces can easily retrieve enterprise data from the field. Mobility software is related to Application Development software and Mobile Device Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Wireless Expense Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Wireless Expense Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Wireless Expense Management software automates the process of monitoring, auditing and reducing wireless billing expenses. These applications aid businesses and other organizations measure, manage, predict and optimize expenditures related to their mobile telephone systems. Wireless Expense Management solutions also aid in tracking mobile device assets, preserving the security data on wireless devices and eliminating fraudulent use of these devices. Wireless Expense Management software is related to Telecom Expense Management software and Call Accounting software.
